definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The striated and polished surfaces are called slickensides .
sentences.chinese: 有條痕的磨光面則稱爲擦痕面。

sentences.english: Most of these streaks are darker than the surrounding sand.
sentences.chinese: 這些條痕大多數都比周圍的沙子更暗。

sentences.english: High-tech ammonia free formula cleans effectively without leaving streaks or lint.
sentences.chinese: 高科技無氨配方效清潔沒殘餘條痕或線頭。
